data.text: The rebels are deep in slaughter,
Their deeds won’t allow them to turn to their God,
The pride of Israel testifies to his face.
They will go with their flocks and with their herds to seek Yahweh,
Ephraim will become a desolation in the day of rebuke.
The princes of Judah are like those who remove a landmark.
Therefore I am to Ephraim like a moth,
For I will be to Ephraim like a lion,
I will go and return to my place,
